reviewText: I have the whole set of these DVDs and share them with my group. We really like them and have gotten some ideas from them.

These are being sent out unsolicited by the maker and then a bill for it follows. There is a disclaimer in fine print buried in the "bill" that it was unsolicited and you don't have to pay but the rest makes it look like you need to pay or return the dvd. If they have to scam to sell this DVD, I can't imagine this is a worthwhile purchase.
